eventDecorators.name: ExcessTokensWithdrawn
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a Migration is executed. Triggers on new deposit call.

eventDecorators.name: OwnershipRenounced
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a Migration is executed. Triggers on new deposit call.

eventDecorators.name: OwnershipTransferred
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a Migration is executed. Triggers on new deposit call.

eventDecorators.name: AccessGranted
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a Migration is executed. Triggers on new deposit call.

eventDecorators.name: AccessRevoked
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a Migration is executed. Triggers on new deposit call.

functionDecorators.name: transferFromVault
functionDecorators.description: Transfers a certain amount of funds to an address.

parameterDecorators.name: id
parameterDecorators.description: The vault from which to send the tokens.

parameterDecorators.name: amount
parameterDecorators.description: Number of the token to be sent.

functionDecorators.name: transferToVault
functionDecorators.description: Transfers tokens from an address (that has approved the proxy) to the vault.

parameterDecorators.name: id
parameterDecorators.description: The vault which will receive the tokens.

parameterDecorators.name: from
parameterDecorators.description: Address from which the tokens will be taken.

parameterDecorators.name: amount
parameterDecorators.description: Number of the token to be sent.

functionDecorators.name: renounceOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Renouncing to ownership will leave the contract without an owner. It will not be possible to call the functions with the `onlyOwner` modifier anymore. Allows the current owner to relinquish control of the contract.

functionDecorators.name: withdrawExcessToken
functionDecorators.description: Allows the owner to withdraw any excess tokens sent to the vault by unconventional means, including (but not limited-to) token airdrops. Any tokens moved to the vault by TOKEN_PROXY will be accounted for and will not be withdrawable by this function.

functionDecorators.name: transferOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

parameterDecorators.name: _newOwner
parameterDecorators.description: The address to transfer ownership to.
